Package com.example.lotteryapp

Class ProfileImageGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.example.lotteryapp.ProfileImageGenerator
public class ProfileImageGenerator extends Object
The ProfileImageGenerator class provides a method to generate a bitmap image representing a user's initials on a colored background. This is typically used for generating user profile images where the image is created dynamically from the user's name.

The generated image will display the first two letters of the user's name, in uppercase, centered on a square background with a color derived from the user's name.

  • Method Details

    • generateTextDrawable

      public static android.graphics.Bitmap generateTextDrawable(String text)
      Generates a bitmap image that displays the initials of a given text (typically a name) on a colored background.

      The method creates a 400x400 pixel image where the background color is determined by the hash of the input text. The initials of the text are then drawn at the center of the image.

      Parameters:
      text - The input string from which the initials will be extracted and displayed on the image. Typically, this would be a user's name or any string.
      Returns:
      A Bitmap object containing the generated image with the initials on the background.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the input text is null.
      See Also:
      • Bitmap
      • Canvas
      • Paint

    • generateBackgroundColor

      private static int generateBackgroundColor(String text)
      Generates a background color for the image based on the input text (usually the user's name).

      This method converts the input text into a hash code and then derives a unique RGB color from the hash value to use as the background color.

      Parameters:
      text - The input string from which the background color will be derived.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the RGB color to be used as the background.
      See Also:
      • Color
